title: Teen in Distress Tragedy
body: Hundreds of thousands gathered in Yerushalayim for a massive atzeres tefillah when a 17-year-old bochur fell to his death from a high-rise building. The tragedy highlights the need to recognize signs of distress in teens before it's too late.

title: Yerushalayim Tragedy Eyewitness Account
body: Rabbi Menachem Mendel Litzman, 17, fell to his death from a high-rise under construction in Yerushalayim's Migdal Marom complex. Eyewitnesses blame police for failing to act before the tragedy, while police offer their own version of events.
